experience.title: Affiliate Marketing
details: Developing and managing websites with a focus on content and organic traffic.
Grew OddHikers.se from 5000 yearly users in 2020 to over 200000 in 2023.

experience.title: Marketing Intern
details: Worked with SEO, translations, content creation, and web development.

skills_and_tools.Web development: Experience developing in WordPress with a strong base in HTML and CSS, along with basic knowledge of JavaScript and React which is continuously being improved.
skills_and_tools.SEO: Wide base in SEO from affiliate marketing, excelling in keyword analysis and crafting high quality content around those keywords.
skills_and_tools.CMS: Extensive experience with WordPress including developing websites from scratch, plus some experience with WooCommerce and Magento.
skills_and_tools.Tools: Proficient with analytics tools such as Google Analytics, Search Console & Tag Manager; SEO tools like SEMrush & Screaming Frog; and developer tools such as VS Code, Git, and GitHub.
skills_and_tools.Agile Project Management: Trained in agile project methodologies, specifically using the Scrum framework.

education.description: Frontend development focusing on JavaScript & React.
Focused on product development, project management and marketing.
